sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './index.css'; export default function About() { return (

about me ✧*･ﾟ✧

background

Hi, I'm Sara! I am a 4th year student at the University of Southern California.✌️



I entered university with no knowledge of what coding was. As a freshman, I took a class in computer simulations to fulfill a GE. After writing my first program in MatLab (Conway's Game of Life), I became enamored with the art of programming!



The following semester, I decided to pursue a minor in computer programming, and have since continued to learn both in the classroom and independently.



In addition to being a self-proclaimed software developer, I am a multimedia artist! My two passions seem distinct in concept, but I strive to combine them in my projects to create something unique.



With my knowledge of art, design, and code, I create software that is beautiful, inside and out. My main focuses are websites and games. I also design ui and illustrate for projects.

what I do

  • Work as a TA for USC Information Technology Program courses, including ITP104 (Web Publishing) and ITP301 (Front-End Web Development)
  • Graphic design for USC Student Affairs
  • Am the webmaster for KXSC, USC's student-run radio (I also DJ a weekly radio show!)
  • Design websites for clients with InnoD @ USC

skills

  • C++
  • HTML/CSS
  • React
  • JavaScript
  • TypeScript
  • Java
  • Python
  • Figma
  • Adobe Illustrator & Photoshop
); }
